ygData.subject: The battle for the CF continues...
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: I m familiar the whole Raksha approach to the war, Unitron, and sometimes its very true, but not always.  no transformer is purely good or purely evil,

OOC: I'm familiar the whole 'Raksha' approach to the war, Unitron, and 
sometimes its very true, but not always.  no transformer is purely good or 
purely evil, no matter what they do.

:::Sideswipe/Ratchet/Torca:::

::Sideswipe got hit by one of the missles but destroyed the other.  He fired 
2 missles and 25 shots in various directions he thought Double Punch was::
~~~~~
::Ratchet got hit by 3 stinger missles and 2 ion disks, making him fall 
backwards. he quickly retaliated by firing 1 tusk missle and 15 shots form 
one gun at Injector and 1 tusk missle and 15 shots from his other gun at 
Manterror::
~~~~~
::Torca got hit by 2 stinger missles and fired another 25 nails at Bumblebee::


--part1_64.9a4a49d.2773b10c_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
